root.Summary: 1: Karpel-Massler G, Shu C, Chau L, Banu M, Halatsch ME, Westhoff MA, Ramirez Y, Ross AH, Bruce JN, Canoll P, Siegelin MD. Combined inhibition of Bcl-2/Bcl-xL andUsp9X/Bag3 overcomes apoptotic resistance in glioblastoma in vitro and in vivo.Oncotarget. 2015 Jun 10;6(16):14507-21. PubMed PMID: 26008975; PubMed CentralPMCID: PMC4546483.
